item.description:
This regular feature at the downtown Sel de la Terre was brought to our attention by a new member. It includes a $38 prix fixe dinner with four courses chosen to complement four wines from Down Under: a Sauvignon Blanc, a Riesling, a Pinot Noir, and a Cabernet. The complete menu wasn't available when we reserved space, but the entree is a lamb daube and one of the first courses is a grapefruit creme brulee. . . that much was enough to sell me completely and make me fling a shoe at the TV when it ran another "Outback Steakhouse" commercial. . .

Visit the Sel de la Terre website for more details. . .
item.name: Dining Down Under: Aussie/NZ Wine Wednesday at Sel de la Terre
